name: 约翰·道尔顿
bio_short: 英国化学家、物理学家和气象学家。他以开创“现代原子理论”（`dalton_atomic_theory_1803`）和编制第一张“原子量表”而闻名于世。他还对“色盲”（道尔顿症）进行了最早的科学研究。
bio_short_en: An English chemist, physicist, and meteorologist. He is famous for pioneering the 'modern atomic theory' (`dalton_atomic_theory_1803`) and creating the first 'table of atomic weights'. He also conducted the first scientific study of 'color blindness' (Daltonism).
